title: The Putin Files: Excursions Around the Ideology of Pain
description: In The Putin Files , the eleventh entry in the popular INTERVENTIONS series, Wolé Ṣóyinká with typical ardency, takes on the still unfolding and increasingly brutal war in Ukraine and what it's resolution — one way or another — might portend for the future of our very fragile continent.
author: Wole Soyinka
